item.title: Needs resurfacing multiple potholes, 30th June

item.title: Discarded paving slab outside house, 30th June
item.description:
There are large concrete slabs left propped against the wall but they're heavy and dangerous if they get knocked over. Could they be removed? Thanks so much

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 60, Brunswick Street, St Paul’s, Cheltenham

item.title: Trees over grown, 30th June
item.description:
When getting out the junction it is hard to see the road ahead as overgrown trees and bushes in the way. Plus with parked cars too close to the junction it’s making it harder to see clearly getting out. It has over grown over the metal railing and onto footpath. All that area has overgrown and not been cut down.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Meadow Close, Golden Valley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass and other Fauna, 30th June
item.description:
Grass and other fauna has not been cut allowing the overgrowth of vegetation on this roundabout causing obstruction to the safe observation of other traffic while negotiating this roundabout, i wish to add that several roundabouts on the A419 in Cirencester are also in dire need of maintenance also
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Barnwood, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees blocking junction, 29th June
item.description:
The trees and bushes along Pirton lane heading towards Cordingley Close are overgrown. This means trying to exit Cordingley onto Pirton is extremely dangerous as you cannot see the oncoming traffic. There have been several near misses. The overgrown trees and bushes do not allow pedestrians to easily reach the bus stop which is also along this stretch of road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pirton Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole and high speed, 29th June
item.description:
There is a sewer cover in this area that gets deeper every day,it causing damage to cars.this street in general is in need of work on the pavement and every day it deteriorates more.About speed, I think they should make some speed bumps on this street because drivers abuse the speed limit.I can give the example that my old car was destroyed on my private park due to a driver who was speeding and couldn't stop his car.Me and all the neighbors in this area waitingfor resolving this matter as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole around manhole cover, 29th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Whittington, Cotswold
